name: OjasviT
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: OjasviT offers IoT Devices which can be controlled remotely from OjasviT mobile app. Link your OjasviT account to this skill and control your devices with Alexa. You can even invoke scenes with this skill. Many more features to come...
